name: Hexagon Ultra
summary: Immerse in a strategic world of hexagonal tiles. Command blue against relentless red in a thrilling AI clash. Move strategically, split tiles, and adapt to secure dominance.  Fill the board, outnumber the enemy for triumph. Free Demo: Test skills in three levels. In-App Purchases: Unlock 30+ levels, diverse environments, and unique enemies.   Hexagon Ultra evolves with new modes, environments, and characters. Download now for ongoing excitement!
